name: Egg Hunt (itch) (DavidDevsDumbStuff)
description:
Egg Hunt is basically a game where you have to collect easter eggs in a forest while an evil easter bunny hunts you down and tries to kill you.

This game was also made in like 2 days because I wanted to create an easter themed horror game, and I had the idea like 2 days before easter. So there's probably gonna be at least a few bugs.

Also, if you do end up enjoying this game, I would appreciate it if you checked out my youtube channel, and maybe even subscribed if you feel like it :D

Edit 1: FIXED THE LAG (i think) sorry about that
